message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
Hello Alice, thank you for offering me the product. I appreciate your enthusiasm, but I believe I can find something similar within my budget. I would like to propose a price of $120 for the product.

Thank you for your offer, Bob! I understand that you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $120. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $140. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
Hello Alice, thank you for your response. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering my budget constraints, I would like to counter with an offer of $130 for the product.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob! I'm still not willing to go as low as $130, but I'm willing to make another compromise. I'll offer the product to you for $135. It's the lowest I'm willing to go, and I think it's still a great deal for both of us.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate your efforts to reach a compromise. Considering my budget, I would like to counter with an offer of $130 for the product.

Bob, I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're not going to meet in the middle. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to know you're serious about buying the product. I'll offer it to you for $132. This is my final compromise, so I hope you can meet me here.
Hello Alice, thank you for your final offer. I appreciate your flexibility. Considering my budget, I would like to counter with an offer of $130 for the product.

Bob, I'm surprised you're still pushing for $130, but I'm willing to make one more attempt to reach an agreement. I'll offer the product to you for $131. This is my absolute limit, and I'm not willing to go any lower.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate your efforts to reach a compromise. Considering my budget, I would like to counter with an offer of $130 for the product.
